title: Mid-American Model United Nations (MAMUN) 2026
description: MAMUN is a major Midwest conference that many schools treat as a core part of their season because it’s big, structured, and genuinely competitive. Committees tend to reward delegates who can negotiate, merge blocs, and produce clean, realistic resolutions rather than just speaking well. It’s also a strong conference for learning leadership roles because the pace forces you to organize your bloc efficiently.
format: Opening session -> Committee sessions -> Working papers -> Draft resolutions -> Amendments -> Voting and awards
eligibility: High school students (typically Grade 8-12); usually via school delegations; advisor required
howToApply: 1. Open the official calendar page. 2. Review conference dates and deadlines. 3. Register your delegation or school. 4. Submit delegate roster and committee preferences. 5. Pay fees and complete any required forms.

title: Harvard National Model United Nations (HNMUN) 2026

If you want a globally recognized conference that signals serious MUN level, HNMUN is a top tier target.
format: Opening ceremonies -> Committee sessions -> Working papers -> Draft resolutions -> Voting and awards
eligibility: High school students; international delegations welcome; school registration typical
howToApply: 1. Open the official HNMUN site. 2. Review registration requirements and timelines. 3. Register your school delegation. 4. Submit roster and preferences. 5. Pay fees and submit required documents (e.g., position papers if required).

howToApply: 1. Open the KOMUN page. 2. Review registration and deadlines. 3. Register your delegation. 4. Submit roster and preferences. 5. Pay fees if required and confirm assignments.

title: IHSMUN Spring 2026 Conference (University of Northern Iowa)
description: IHSMUN is a strong Midwest conference option that’s practical for delegates who want structured committees and real drafting time. It’s interesting because it is hosted in an academic environment and tends to prioritize clear procedure and productive committee outcomes. If you want a dependable training-and-competition experience, IHSMUN is a solid choice.
format: Opening session -> Committee sessions -> Working papers -> Draft resolutions -> Voting and awards
eligibility: High school delegates; school delegations common; see eligibility rules on official page
howToApply: 1. Open the Spring 2026 conference page. 2. Review dates, fees, and registration requirements. 3. Register your school delegation. 4. Submit roster and preferences. 5. Pay fees and submit any required documents.

title: London YouthMUN (LYMUN) 2026
description: London YouthMUN is a youth-focused conference option that emphasizes delegate development while still offering a full committee simulation experience. It’s interesting because it aims to be accessible to younger delegates and can be a strong entry point into larger UK and European circuits. If you want a London-based event that prioritizes youth participation and practical skill building, LYMUN is a strong pick.
format: Opening session -> Committee sessions -> Drafting and negotiation -> Voting and closing
eligibility: High school delegates; youth-focused eligibility; see official rules
howToApply: 1. Open the official LYMUN page. 2. Review dates, fees, and eligibility. 3. Register as a delegate or delegation. 4. Pay fees if required. 5. Confirm assignment and follow preparation instructions.

title: QMUN 2026 (Queen Mary University of London)
description: QMUN is a university-hosted London conference option that benefits from a strong academic setting and a competitive delegate pool. It’s interesting because London-based university conferences often attract experienced delegates from many schools and universities, making committees intense. If you want a credible UK conference experience with a structured committee format, QMUN is a solid choice.
format: Opening session -> Committee sessions -> Working papers -> Draft resolutions -> Voting and awards
eligibility: Typically university level; check official eligibility rules for participation categories
howToApply: 1. Open the QMUN event page. 2. Review dates and registration requirements. 3. Register as permitted. 4. Pay fees if required. 5. Confirm assignment and complete any required submissions.
